attributes.title: remove this app 🤢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with an open mind and the intention to educate myself about Trump and his campaign, but I was highly disappointed. When I first opened the app, I was greeted by a picture of Donald Trump flipping me off! It was extremely unsettling and showed me who he really was. But, that wasn’t the worst part. I clicked on the tab “events” and all it had was trumps pooping schedule 💩🤮. This man is disgusting and a disgrace to our nation. This is a terrible app.

attributes.title: so dissatisfied😔
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of being enlightened by our orange king, the pedo... i mean ...president of the untied states, but after listening to Daveed Diggs’ absolute banger of a song Chapter 319, the app just wouldn’t open😳 i was so excited to be reading everything about  MY president, but one listen to daveed and the app never opened again😔🤟 i guess something about “donald trump is a white supremacist” just doesn’t sit well with the programming, idk might be a glitch

attributes.title: WILL GIVE YOUR PHONE A VIRUS !!!!
attributes.review:
DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!!!! I downloaded it to see what our smart and woke president had to say and my phone was immediately overwhelmed by the amount of nonsense that was on this app. So much so that it gave my poor phone a seizure and to top it all of it got the worst virus ever imaginable! 
I had to buy a new phone. Apple needs to do something about this app because it gives everyones phone a virus and makes some people very stupid and close minded!

attributes.title: The worst app I have ever used!!
attributes.review: I opened this app expecting to have a pleasant experience but that is FAR from what I got. I have never been so shocked to see such a horrific layout. As a member of the IT Academy at my high school, I know what a good functional app looks like, and this just simply is not it. I am terribly disappointed with Trumps tech employees for putting this piece of crap together and actually expecting people to enjoy using it! Absolutely disgraceful!

attributes.title: everything wrong with the app
attributes.review:
To start off the app was disgusting, when you open the app it showed this racist, homophobic, and rapist. His picture mad me as a women feel really uncomfortable... i’m really hungry right now so ima go eat some soup but this app overall was disgusting. I hate cheeto puffs now!!!!! 
Also it shows the picture of a man who’s shrimp was leaked not to long ago and as a 17 year old i feel violated of my rights and my eyes have been unvirginized.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app has terrible glitches. Ever since I downloaded it my phone has been getting hacked. They’ve been taking my money from my bank accounts, hacking my social media, I’m scared they’re even watching me through my phone. I know it’s from this app, I’ve had my phone for years. The second I downloaded this app, this happens. They keep sending me naked pictures of a Cheeto man. I need this app off the App Store !!!!

attributes.title: So bad and inappropriate
attributes.review: I open the app to see how the politics are going and then when I open it my screen goes black and then I see 👁👄👁 on the black screen and then my phone started making a Moan noise while it was showing nudes of Donald Trump this app is terrible and for proof I came out of the app my phone was fine opened the app again but then this time my screen got spammed with uno uno uno and then another porn photo of trump

attributes.title: OH BROTHER THIS GUY STINKS 🤮
attributes.review: This app won’t stop sending my notifications 🙈 guys please make it stop 👀 my grandma is a trump 🟠 supporter 👍 so I said “let’s 👯 give 🤲 it 🤑 a 🏢 try 🪀” and then my phone kept blowing up 💥 with notifications from “Trump 2020” 🙀I tried opening my phone to delete ❌ the app 📲 but it wasn’t recognizing my face 🤔 so I looked 👀 in a mirror 🗑 and I was ORANGE?! 🤬 I had my perfect summer ☀️ tan and now my freckles are gone ☁️ and my skin 💪 is the colour of a poor person 🙏 highlighter 😤

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY NOT
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, my pet giraffe-elephant (named Gerald) ate my refrigerator. I was extremely confused because he normally just ate the microwave and occasionally the stove when he was bored, but then my phone started glitching and it started raining Cheetos and there was a GIANT Cheeto dust tornado that sucked up my grandmothers pet fishes turtle-monkey-bird tribrid pet and a velociraptor ate my homosexual brother. 0/10 would not recommend. Wouldn’t even have given it 1 star but there is nothing lower sadly.

attributes.title: worst app ever❤️
attributes.review: i do not recommend this app to anyone. i now have severe ptsd from this app😞. when i opened the app i my eyes were exposed to a horrendous image of donald trump in an american print thong posing all seductively and i don’t think my eyes will ever be the same😿. after the i didn’t even bother to proceed to the rest of the app since i was already scarred from that experience DO NOT GET THIS APP YOU WILL REGRET IT IM BEGGING YOU. my life will never be the same i’m thinking of filing a lawsuit😞😔😣😖😢😿.
